缺乏坚定的信念和低信任度：美国人不确定健康错误信息时代的真相大约十分之三的美国人仍然相信伊维菌素是治疗新冠病毒的有效方法。此外，KFF 的一项新民意调查显示，很少有人高度信任任何形式的新闻媒体或官方机构能够准确传达有关健康主题的信息，从新冠治疗和疫苗到生殖健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Few-firm-beliefs-and-low-trust-Americans-not-sure-whate28099s-true-in-age-of-health-misinformation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Few-firm-beliefs-and-low-trust-Americans-not-sure-whate28099s-true-in-age-of-health-misinformation.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a13ef638-2a8b-485b-b024-b6791b04ef7d Tue, 22 Aug 2023 06:45:49 -0400 Few firm beliefs and low trust: Americans not sure what’s true in age of health misinformation
医生们提倡采取新的努力来对抗恰加斯病这一无声杀手1997 年，当 Maira Gutiérrez 被诊断出患有恰加斯病时，她和她的初级保健医生都没有听说过这种疾病。她在参加了雇主环球影城组织的红十字会献血活动后，偶然发现了自己的病情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Doctors-advocate-fresh-efforts-to-combat-Chagas-disease-a-silent-killer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Doctors-advocate-fresh-efforts-to-combat-Chagas-disease-a-silent-killer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=323ffec9-82c5-4b78-b26a-285ee56ec3c3 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 06:44:04 -0400 Doctors advocate fresh efforts to combat Chagas disease, a silent killer
